Articles.Content:
I really love this game. Hopeful that someone create a mod that weld part together. Too much part for 1 Tank

I make this MKIII as simple as i can. So you can customize it as you want it to be

List mod:

Magic Smoke Industries Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Infernal Robotics: kerbalspaceprogram.com/infernal-robotics-v0-6a-parts-pack-1-magic-smoke-industries-ksp-v0-21-1/

Caterpillar Tracks:kerbalspaceprogram.com/caterpillar-tracks/

Modular Multiwheels and Omniwheels : kerbalspaceprogram.com/modular-multiwheels-and-omniwheels-v0-6-tt-plugin-for-ksp-0-20-and-0-19/

Download .Craft file : http://www./?zad6zpow6p6am90

Edited September 9, 2013 by hellknguyen
You have some cool staff here! It would be better with download links

Some really nice tanks! I really like your style. May I recommend you add a 'lower glacis' to your vehicles? It just irks me, since I usually study armored vehicles a lot.

Lower Glacis (bottom front of tank): http://data3.primeportal.net/tanks/jian_zhen_wei/merkava_iv/images/merkava_iv_01_of_57.jpg

But anyways, I love your tanks!
This would be much better with a list of parts and a set of craft files. As it is, it's bloody sexy.
Can you give a download link for those tanks. I would really appreciate that since they are amazing.

Wow. Finally, a ride worthy of Jeb! Now he can drive to work without getting looked at funny for being an amazing pilot riding around in a car

(Yeah, he was arrested for trying to fly to work. The authorities don't like him landing in the parking lot. "It's just a short runway!" he said to them, clearly aggravated. He was kept to a biplane and was restrained from the sleek jet fighters he loves (that he modified with SABRE engines so he could fly at around mach 15 and get to work in 3 seconds)... Poor Jeb... )

Great job. Jeb will love you for this if you let him ride it!
Thank everyone, I'm sorry for download link and my late rep. I make it from may mods that I can't remember. I will post everything here after rebuild it with less part & mod with MK IV.

These are absolutely amazing. I just slap a GAU on one of Zekes' tanks and call it a day.

Edited due to loss of relevance.

Edited September 15, 2013 by Varyon

Update link download. Sorry for my late.

Edited September 9, 2013 by hellknguyen
Update looks very nice and looks like a mix of modern MBT, most like a Challenger II with a 'overturned bowl' turret. I love it! Very nice.
Definitely has something about a Challenger II in it. Neat tank design, now we just need to strap a 120 mm tank gun on it and we are set.
